summary: The Administrative Office of the U.S. Courts relies on IT systems for court administration and probation and pretrial services. We looked at the Office's IT workforce management. The Office didn't have a strategic approach to addressing its IT workforce needs, although it had taken steps to implement leading practices. For example, it didn't have a recruiting strategy or training program focused on its IT workforce...
title: U.S. Courts: Action Needed to Improve IT Management and Establish a Chief Information Officer
